channel.title: 508 weird command proplem
channel.description:
Hey guys im trying to make a 508 and when i added in a command i found that there was more than one command in the whole thing i thought that was just normal becuase im not used to 508's and i didn't know if there is supposed to be there or not. so i changed all of them, the command i did was add astral's to ::runes and i saved and compiled i went on and it worked. so i was happy then i thought i would change ::food so it comes in notes so i did that then saved and compiled i went in and it did not work. and i tryed ::home (which did work before ) and it didnt work neither does some other commands like ::help. This is my run file and when i type in a command something comes up [code]Starting server on port: 43594 Connection recieved from: 5.139.67.104 Connection recieved from: 5.139.67.104 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:849) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:849) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code] that was lots of commands i tryed. this is my food command, [code] } else if (cmd[0].equals("food")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 392, 2000000);[/code] and this my runes command (which i found it lots of places [code]else if (cmd[0].equals("runes")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 556, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 557, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 558, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 559, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 561, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 562, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 563, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 564, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 565, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 566, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9075, 100000); }[/code] also im wondering if there is like a client.java in 508 and if there is where is it? and if there isnt where do i change the login message to my server? and also is there a way i can change the player rights for certain commands? thanks a lot!,
~Breeendo~/~Red Arrow~

item.title: 508 weird command proplem
item.dc:creator: @red_arrow red arrow
item.description:
@red_arrow wrote:

Hey guys
im trying to make a 508 and when i added in a command i found that there was more than one command in the whole thing i thought that was just normal becuase im not used to 508’s and i didn’t know if there is supposed to be there or not.
so i changed all of them, the command i did was add astral’s to ::runes and i saved and compiled i went on and it worked. so i was happy then i thought i would change ::food so it comes in notes so i did that then saved and compiled i went in and it did not work.
and i tryed ::home (which did work before ) and it didnt work
neither does some other commands like ::help.
This is my run file and when i type in a command something comes up

Starting server on port: 43594 Connection recieved from: 5.139.67.104 Connection recieved from: 5.139.67.104 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:849) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:849) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:95) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:329) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
that was lots of commands i tryed.
this is my food command,

} else if (cmd[0].equals("food")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 392, 2000000);
and this my runes command (which i found it lots of places

else if (cmd[0].equals("runes")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 556, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 557, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 558, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 559, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 561, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 562, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 563, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 564, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 565, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 566, 100000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9075, 100000); }
also im wondering if there is like a client.java in 508 and if there is where is it?
and if there isnt where do i change the login message to my server?
and also is there a way i can change the player rights for certain commands?
thanks a lot!,

~Breeendo~/~Red Arrow~
